title: Russell Wilson's future? Best QB in the AFC? Playoff picture; Nyheim Hines; Scott Pioli
itunes:title: Russell Wilson's future? Best QB in the AFC? Playoff picture; Nyheim Hines; Scott Pioli
description:
In the latest edition of the Good Morning Football Podcast, hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and former NFL FB Michael Robinson open up discussing the future of Russell Wilson and Pete Carroll with the Seattle Seahawks; then they debate who's the best quarterback in the AFC; they're joined by Scott Pioli and he shares if he's a believer in this Los Angeles Rams team and how the New England Patriots have found success this season; and lastly, they're joined by Nyheim Hines and he talks about his role in the Indianapolis Colts running attack and why Jonathan Taylor should be in the mix for MVP.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
